name: Sentry Error Tracking
description: Integrate with Sentry Error Tracking to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Issues
tools.description: List Sentry issues for a project. Filter by query string, sort order, or status.

tools.name: Get Issue
tools.description: Retrieve details of a specific Sentry issue by its ID. Returns title, culprit, status, event count, and metadata.

tools.name: List Events
tools.description: List events for a specific Sentry issue. Returns event IDs, timestamps, and tags.

tools.name: List Projects
tools.description: List all Sentry projects in the organization. Returns project slugs, platforms, and statuses.

tools.name: Resolve Issue
tools.description: Resolve a Sentry issue by setting its status to "resolved". Can also set status to "ignored" or "unresolved".

organization.label: Organization Slug
organization.description: Your Sentry organization slug (found in dashboard URL)
